title: Swarm card
data:
***Version [0.27](/0.27 "0.27")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | The card depicts a bear surrounded by a swarm of bees. It hums ominously.Drawing this card will summon bees. |

The Swarm card summons a swarm of friendly [killer bees](/Killer_bee "Killer bee").

Power Level 0: `1d3` bees

Power Level 1: `1d6` bees

Power Level 2: `1d9` bees

The Swarm card could be found in the following [decks](/Decks "Decks") over the past several versions.

| [0.11](/0.11 "0.11")                                                                  | [0.12](/0.12 "0.12")                                                                  | [0.13](/0.13 "0.13")                                                                  | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                  | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                  | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16")                                                                  | [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")                                                                  | [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                                                  | [0.19](/0.19 "0.19") and beyond                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") [War](/Deck_of_war "Deck of war") | [Summoning](/Deck_of_summoning "Deck of summoning") |

## History

- Prior to [0.27](/0.27 "0.27"), this card was known as **Foxfire** and could summon multiple flying creatures ([butterflies](/Butterflies "Butterflies"), [insubstantial wisps](/Insubstantial_wisp "Insubstantial wisp"), [vampire mosquitoes](/Vampire_mosquito "Vampire mosquito"), and [hornets](/Hornet "Hornet")), some of which could arrive hostile.
- The Foxfire card is one of 23 cards to be kept in the deck simplification of [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"). The deck of war was removed in this version.

## See also

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")
- [Decks](/Decks "Decks")

Swarm card

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
The card depicts a bear surrounded by a swarm of bees. It hums ominously.

Drawing this card will summon bees.

The Swarm card summons a swarm of friendly killer bees.

Power Level 0: 1d3 bees

Power Level 1: 1d6 bees

Power Level 2: 1d9 bees

The Swarm card could be found in the following decks over the past several versions.

0.11 0.12 0.13 0.14 0.15 0.16 0.17 0.18 0.19 and beyond

History

  • Prior to 0.27, this card was known as Foxfire and could summon multiple flying creatures (butterflies, insubstantial wisps, vampire mosquitoes, and hornets), some of which could arrive hostile.
  • The Foxfire card is one of 23 cards to be kept in the deck simplification of 0.19. The deck of war was removed in this version.
